titleStmt.title: The brand pluck'd out of the fire a sermon preached before the lord major, aldermen, and companies of London on Novemb. 5 at Pauls by Edward Reynolds.
titleStmt.author: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Ratcliffe for George Thomason ...,

notesStmt.note: Running title: A sermon preached at Pauls on the fift[h] of Novemb.
